content: knitted shawl in drops air the piece is worked sideways in garter stitch drops design pattern ai-439 yarn group c or a + a **size** height measured down the middle = approx 28 cm width measured along the top = approx 116 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 38 electric orange **needles** drops circular needle size 5mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 33 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm
